scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.test:all: npm run backend:test:ci && npm run frontend:test:ci
scripts.test:ci:all: npm run install:all && npm run test:all
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:check: cd frontend && npm run lint:check && cd ../backend && npm run lint:check
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.format:check: cd frontend && npm run format:check && cd ../backend && npm run format:check
